alert.note: Alert for Arkansas; Monroe (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 02 at 10:10AM CST until February 09 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Arkansas... White River At Clarendon affecting Monroe and Arkansas Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...White River At Clarendon. * WHEN...Until early Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...At 26.0 feet, River flows in many side channels and creates islands between the river and sloughs and creeks. Flooding of cropland and timber is occurring. Portions of the National Wildlife Refuge downstream of Clarendon flooding. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 AM CST Thursday the stage was 26.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 26.4 feet Saturday morning. It will then fall below flood stage Tuesday evening. - Flood stage is 26.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecast 12 PM Crest Location Stg Stg Day/Time Fri Sat Sun Crest Time Date White River Clarendon 26.0 26.2 Thu 9 AM 26.3 26.4 26.3 26.4 6 AM 2/04 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. River forecasts are based on current conditions and rainfall forecasted to occur over the next 24 hours. During periods of flooding...Evening forecasts are reissued with updated rainfall forecasts. Observed and forecasted stage data plots are available on our Advanced Hydrologic Prediction Service web page at... www.weather.gov/lzk Under the Current Conditions section...Select River and Lakes AHPS.
